ValidationRule.description: This Validation prevent users from changing any values on the Opportunity record except the Opportunity Stage when the Opportunity Stage is set to "Final Bid Submitted".
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( (NOT(ISNEW()) && RecordType.Name == 'BAC Overview' && ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Final Bid Submitted')), IF(ISCHANGED(StageName), FALSE, TRUE ), FALSE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: No attributes can be modified in the Final Bid Submitted Stage.
